text: Oliver Dimsdale (born 28 October 1972)Debrett's People of Today, Oliver Dimsdale, Esq Profile Retrieved 2011-03-25. is an English actor, known for portraying Louis Trevelyan in the BBC TV serial He Knew He Was Right and Grantchester. ==References== Category:1972 births Category:Living people Category:Actors from Buckinghamshire
title: Oliver Dimsdale
